DOC.brief_summary: This cross-over design study subject arrive lab assign supplement ingest . Prior ingestion subject complete baseline reaction time test along questionnaire . Thirty minute ingestion subject fill questionnaire , complete reaction time test , follow series dynamic exercise . After last exercise finish subject fill questionnaire , complete another reaction time test repeat series dynamic exercise . Following exercise , subject fill questionnaire complete fourth round reaction time test . In total subject would complete 2 round dynamic exercise 4 round reaction time test heart rate record dynamic exercise round . Subjects tell wash-out 7 day return lab complete test alternative supplement .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Caffeine Blend Reaction Time , Mental Performance Focus Athletic Males
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects express interest study , interview Human Performance Lab ( HPL ) determine whether appear qualify participate study . Qualifying subject , invite back HPL entry/familiarization session verbally tell requirement study . During session , subject sign Informed Consent Statements complete personal medical history questionnaire . Subject familiarize study protocol via verbal write explanation outline study design . This include describe test session subject test perform include Makoto test system ( reaction time test ) . Subjects practice several time session eliminate learn curve use new equipment . Subjects also take 1 round dynamic exercise ensure ability complete exercise need . Subjects give appointment time perform qualify Makoto test achieve great equal 70 % accuracy 3 tower level 7 three consecutive trail . Following practice session , subject record food intake via MyFitnessPal three day ( 3-d ) prior baseline test . Subjects instruct refrain exercise , caffeine , alcohol day prior baseline test consume normal breakfast morning test . Subjects give meal replacement bar place lunch , consume ~2 hour test session . During time , subject body composition hemodynamic assessment record . Two hour ingestion meal bar subject report back HPL complete Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) questionnaire , baseline Makoto prior ingest assign supplement . Thirty minute ingestion , Makoto dynamic exerciser complete . This involved subject standardize full body workout 2 different round exercise . After round exercise subject fill VAS perform Makoto test . Subject instructed wash-out schedule 2nd test session ~7 day later .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Subjects males age 1825 year Subjects team sport athletes highly trained Subjects able smoke use tobacco Subjects provide write date informed consent participate study Subjects willing able comply protocol Subjects apparently healthy free disease , determine health history questionnaire Subjects regular caffeine consumer ( 2 cup coffee day ) Subjects agree abstain caffeine day test session Subjects agree abstain exercise 24 hour prior test visit . 48 hour prior test session , subject anything new unaccustomed form exercise increase intensity workout . Subject Exclusion Criteria Subject participate regular physical activity exercise train least 12 month prior enrollment Subject diagnose metabolic chronic disease , prescription medication diagnose metabolic chronic disease Subject use , use dietary supplement ( multivitamin/mineral , protein powder , meal replacement ) within 6 week prior enrollment . Protein/Meal Replacement Products ( MRPs ) must contain supplement creatine , betaalanine , hydroxyl methlybutyrate ( HMB ) , etc . Subject , participate another clinical trial within 8 week prior enrollment Subject know allergy sensitivity caffeine stimulant ( determined health history questionnaire .
